name: AddChestItem
usage: Adds an item to a given map chest. Usage: AddChestItem(Map ID, X coordinate, Y coordinate, Item ID, amount);

name: AddMapItem
usage: Adds an item to a given map location. Usage: AddMapItem(Map ID, X coordinate, Y coordinate, Item ID, amount);

name: AddNpcChat
usage: Adds an NPC chat balloon during a given state. Usage: AddNpcChat(Npc Quest ID, 'message string');

name: AddNpcInput
usage: Adds a link option in the dialog window. Usage: AddNpcInput(Npc Quest ID, Input ID, 'message string');

name: AddNpcPM
usage: Adds a simple message to the dialog window. Usage: AddNpcPM('name string', 'message string');

name: AddNpcText
usage: Adds a simple message to the dialog window. Usage: AddNpcText(Npc Quest ID, 'message string');

name: EmptyChests
usage: Removes all items in all chests on a given map. Usage: EmptyChests(Map ID);

name: End
usage: Ends the quest for good. Displays Quest on History as Completed. Usage: End();

name: GiveBankItem
usage: Rewards a player with an item stored directly in their bank locker. Usage: GiveBankItem(Item ID, amount);

name: GiveExp
usage: Rewards a player with experience points. Usage: GiveExp(amount);

name: GiveItem
usage: Rewards a player with an item. Usage: GiveItem(Item ID, amount);

name: GiveKarma
usage: Rewards karma to a player. Usage: GiveKarma(amount);

name: GiveStat
usage: Adds an amount to the given stat of the player. Usage: GiveStat(Stat, amount);

name: GiveRandomItem
usage: Rewards a player with an item chosen at random from a random bracket. Usage: GiveRandomItem(RandomBracketName);

name: LoadMap
usage: Loads a map or alternate version of a map. Usage: LoadMap(Map ID);

name: PlayEffect
usage: Plays a special effect on a player. Usage: PlayEffect(Effect ID);

name: PlaySound
usage: Plays a sound effect. Usage: PlaySound(Sound ID);

name: PlayMusic
usage: Plays a MIDI music file. Usage: PlayMusic(Music ID);
